title: Diamond-Studded Golden Jhumka Earrings with Pearl Drops
materials: Natural Diamonds (Vajralu) with excellent cut and clarity
South Sea Pearls. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricately crafted Jhumka design with delicate filigree work enhanced with glittering diamonds. The top portion has floral design, with the main body of the Jhumka adorned with a lattice pattern of gold and diamonds. Finished with delicate pearl drops (Mutyala) at the bottom for added elegance. Features a secure post and screw-back closure.
colors: Warm Golden Yellow (Bangaram) from the gold
creamy white from the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian occasions like weddings (Vivahamu)
and half-saree functions (Half Saree Function). Equally suitable for adding a touch of ethnic elegance to modern parties and celebrations.
description: A timeless classic, these Jhumka earrings seamlessly blend traditional South Indian design with modern craftsmanship. The high-quality diamonds and lustrous pearls offer a touch of luxury, while the intricate gold work showcases the skill of Hyderabad's finest artisans. These are not just earrings; they are a statement of cultural pride and enduring beauty (Chirakala Soundaryam).
